title: British Airways Air Hostess' Drunk Boyfriend Gets Into Fight With The Pilot, She Gets Suspended
text:
We hear a lot of fights that take place on flights, either between a drunk passenger and the airline crew, or between passengers themselves. But it is the first time that we’re hearing about a fight between a pilot of British Airways and an air hostess' boyfriend.

According to The Sun, the air hostess, Natalie Flindall’s boyfriend got into a fight with the pilot, after he allegedly got drunk on the flight, during a layover in Singapore. Findall is currently under investigation for the incident.

Natalie Findall - Twitter

The incident took place when some of the crew allegedly smuggled off drinks in the in-flight trolley. According to The Sun, ‘Natalie had invited her boyfriend on the trip. He was meant to take a back seat and just enjoy the ride’.

However, that didn’t happen, as the boyfriend got hammered and as a result, got into a fight with the pilot at the reception area of the hotel in Singapore, where the crew was staying between flights. After the investigation, Natalie was suspended. “Natalie has ended up paying the price but crew members want to know why the pilot escaped scot-free. He was involved in the trouble too,” according to reports.

A spokesperson of the British Airways told The Sun, "We expect the highest standard of behaviour from our colleagues and will always take the appropriate action."

Well, that's not the kind of memory you want from a trip, do you?
description: We hear a lot of fights that take place on flights, either between a drunk passenger and the airline crew or between passengers themselves. But it is the first time that we’ll hear about a pilot and boyfriend of an air hostess fighting after the boyfriend got drunk.
